trans-unit.source: Enables developers to provide a custom, managed implementation of the [IUnknown::QueryInterface(REFIID riid, void **ppvObject)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method.
trans-unit.target: 讓開發人員提供 [IUnknown::QueryInterface(REFIID riid, void **ppvObject)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) 方法的自訂 Managed 實作。

trans-unit.source: This class permits advanced users to provide a customized managed implementation of the `QueryInterface` method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可讓進階的使用者提供的自訂 managed 的實作`QueryInterface`方法。

trans-unit.source: Managed and native applications can use the customized implementation to return a specific interface for a specified interface ID, except for IID_IUnknown.
trans-unit.target: Managed 和原生應用程式可以使用自訂的實作指定的介面識別碼，除了 IID_IUnknown 傳回特定的介面。

trans-unit.source: That is, when `QueryInterface` is called, it will ignore custom implementations if its `riid` parameter is set to IID_IUnknown.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，當`QueryInterface`是呼叫，它將會忽略自訂實作若其`riid`參數設定為 IID_IUnknown。

trans-unit.source: However, you may still return [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) as the `ppvObject`.
Developers can provide custom implementations for all interfaces (except for `IUnknown`) if they define and implement a valid corresponding interface.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以提供所有介面的自訂實作 (除了`IUnknown`) 定義並實作正確對應的介面。

trans-unit.source: A valid user-defined interface has a v-table layout that matches the unmanaged COM interface exactly, and its <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceTypeAttribute> is <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的使用者定義介面具有確實，比對 unmanaged 的 COM 介面的 v 資料表配置和其<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceTypeAttribute>是<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown>。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the requested interface.
A reference to the requested interface, when this method returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，要求之介面的參考。

trans-unit.source: Returns an interface according to a specified interface ID.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的介面 ID，傳回介面。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a custom implementation of [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) was used.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示是否已使用 [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) 的自訂實作。

trans-unit.source: An application can use managed code to specify its own implementation for custom interfaces and standard runtime interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以使用 managed 程式碼，來指定它自己的自訂介面和標準執行階段介面的實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult> return value can be used to enable or disable customized implementations by showing or hiding specific interfaces during COM access.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult>傳回值可以用來啟用或停用來顯示或隱藏特定介面 COM 存取期間的自訂的實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is invisible to COM.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是看不到 com。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。
